meanings.definition: In an egomaniacal manner; with excessive self-centeredness or self-importance.
meanings.sent1: She spoke egomaniacally about her achievements, never acknowledging others' contributions.
meanings.sent2: He egomaniacally believed he was the most talented person in the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted egomaniacally around the house, as if it owned the place.
meanings.sent4: The politician's egomaniacally large ego overshadowed any genuine connection with the voters.
meanings.sent5: The CEO's behavior was so egomaniacally self-absorbed that it alienated the entire team.
